title: Is there a point where you admit defeat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Should I suddenly find myself running in a beautiful field full of blazened skies blue, Forgetting reasonless meanings of passage through worlds in between, Contempt for the hand that slew me or the glorious battles vain Should I hear the winds native tounge speaking through my echoless soul, or feel the water drown worldly maladys from the hell inside my heart's coal, I suppose I would then know, victory I had won in the defeat of thy foe!
